org.openhab.binding.velux.internal.handler.utils

Class ExtendedBaseBridgeHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.binding.BaseThingHandler
      • org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.binding.BaseBridgeHandler
        • org.openhab.binding.velux.internal.handler.utils.ExtendedBaseBridgeHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.binding.BridgeHandler, org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.binding.ThingHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VeluxBridgeHandler

    @NonNullByDefault
public abstract class ExtendedBaseBridgeHandler
extends org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.binding.BaseBridgeHandler
    The ExtendedBaseBridgeHandler extended the BaseBridgeHandler interface and adds publicly visible convenience methods for property handling.
    Author:
    Guenther Schreiner - Initial contribution.

    • Method Detail

      • editProperties

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> editProperties()
        Returns a copy of the properties map, that can be modified. The method updateProperties(java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.String>) must be called to persist the properties.
        Overrides:
        editProperties in class org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.binding.BaseThingHandler
        Returns:
        copy of the thing properties (not null)

      • updateProperties

        public void updateProperties(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties)
        Informs the framework, that the given properties map of the thing was updated. This method performs a check, if the properties were updated. If the properties did not change, the framework is not informed about changes.
        Overrides:
        updateProperties in class org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.binding.BaseThingHandler
        Parameters:
        properties - properties map, that was updated and should be persisted

      • isLinked

        public boolean isLinked(org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.ChannelUID channelUID)
        Returns whether at least one item is linked for the given UID of the channel.
        Overrides:
        isLinked in class org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.binding.BaseThingHandler
        Parameters:
        channelUID - UID of the channel (must not be null)
        Returns:
        true if at least one item is linked, false otherwise
